name: TimeMerlin
tag_list: employee-timesheets, status-reports, time-managment, appraisal-management, asset-management, expense-management, online-employee-management-application
overview:
TimeMerlin
TimeMerlin is a user-friendly and web based system to track time, manage projects, appraisals, employees, expenses and assets. It is a simple employee time management system that creates measurable results and helps bridge the gap between the client and the team.

Successful companies perform activities professionally and on time. TimeMerlin was created for this purpose and is aimed at companies that need a professional business platform at an affordable price.

The various modules of TimeMerlin are:

  1. Employee time management.
  2. Project Management
  3. Employee Appraisals
  4. Asset Management
  5. Expense Management

It can be tried free for 45 days. Visit us at www.timemerlin.com Various Features are:

  1. It is web based and flexible - New solutions are quickly created and updates are regularly provided. Comprehensive system configurations ensure both depth and flexibility, thus adjusting the system to the business â€“ and not the other way around.

  2. Penetrates easily into the organization - TimeMerlin ensures a continuous overview of the organizationâ€™s projects. Employees deliver status report on their activities, and the impact of time sheets and status reports and their significance becomes visible to management and themselves. As TimeMerlin is web based it allows around the clock access from any computer with internet access.

  3. Quick and Easy Start - TimeMerlin can be implemented quickly using only few resources. The user-friendly design of TimeMerlin makes it easy to learn for new users, and further help can be found in the user guides, instruction videos and free support.
